author: Field Level Media
title: Giants place Wilmer Flores on 10-day IL with knee injury - ESPN
text: The [San Francisco Giants](/mlb/team/_/name/sf/san-francisco-giants) placed infielder [Wilmer Flores](http://www.espn.com/mlb/player/_/id/30627/wilmer-flores) on the 10-day injured list Thursday because of right knee tendonitis. The move was retroactive to Wednesday. In a corresponding move, the Giants recalled infielder David Villar from Triple-A Sacramento. "He's a good hitter," Giants manager Bob Melvin said of Villar. "He fits into this group. This will be a better opportunity for him here. He'll play the Wilmer role as far as facing lefties." Flores, 32, last played Tuesday. He had missed nine games with the same injury in late June and early July. "Never really cleared up," Melvin said. "When you're not playing as much and not swinging how you're used to, you're putting in a lot of extra work, and it's not allowing it to really heal." Flores is batting .206 with four home runs and 26 RBIs in 71 games this season. For his 12-year career, Flores is batting .260 with 153 homers and 532 RBIs in 1,212 games for the [New York Mets](/mlb/team/_/name/nym/new-york-mets) (2013-18), [Arizona Diamondbacks](/mlb/team/_/name/ari/arizona-diamondbacks) (2019) and Giants. Villar, 27, is 5-for-17 (.294) with one homer and four RBIs in six games with San Francisco. In parts of three seasons since 2022, he is batting .199 with 15 home runs and 40 RBIs in 104 games.

author: Yann Contegat
title: √Ä vous retourner l‚Äôestomac : certains parasites intestinaux peuvent atteindre 40 m√®tres de long
text:
Depuis au moins une centaine de millions d‚Äôann√©es, des cr√©atures √† l‚Äôallure cauchemardesque se d√©veloppent dans les intestins de nombreuses esp√®ces animales, et il s‚Äôav√®re qu‚Äôelles peuvent atteindre des tailles prodigieuses.
T√©nias g√©ants
Avec une longueur pouvant d√©passer 40 m√®tres, le t√©nia g√©ant Tetragonoporus calyptocephalus, qui prosp√®re dans les entrailles des baleines, fait sans doute partie des parasites intestinaux les plus impressionnants connus.
Initialement d‚Äôune taille tr√®s r√©duite, il se fixe aux parois du tube digestif des c√©tac√©s gr√¢ce √† sa t√™te munie d‚Äô¬´ organes de fixation ¬ª, appel√©e scolex. Profitant des nutriments de son h√¥te, le ver va progressivement d√©velopper de nouveaux segments. Connus sous le nom de proglottis, ils comportent √† la fois un appareil g√©nital hermaphrodite et un appareil excr√©teur. On estime que les sp√©cimens les plus imposants en poss√®dent jusqu‚Äô√† 45 000.
Provenant g√©n√©ralement de viande ou de poisson insuffisamment cuits, les t√©nias qui infectent l‚ÄôHomme (jusqu‚Äô√† ses tissus c√©r√©braux) se distinguent √©galement par leur taille.
Le mus√©e parasitologique de Meguro, √† Tokyo, est connu pour abriter un sp√©cimen de Dibothriocephalus nihonkaiensis de 8,8 m√®tres de long, retir√© intact d‚Äôun intestin humain. Selon une √©tude publi√©e en 2009.), ces vers parasites peuvent mesurer, dans les cas les plus extr√™mes, jusqu‚Äô√† 25 m√®tres.
Parasites anciens
D√©but 2024, l‚Äôidentification d‚Äôun tentacule de t√©nia dans un morceau d‚Äôambre vieux de 99 millions d‚Äôann√©es avait r√©v√©l√© que de tels parasites intestinaux s√©vissaient d√©j√† au milieu du Cr√©tac√©. Avant cela, les exemples les plus pr√©coces confirm√©s se r√©sumaient √† des oeufs d√©couverts dans des excr√©ments de requin fossilis√©s datant du Permien.
Selon les chercheurs, ce nombre remarquablement faible de t√©moignages fossiles s‚Äôexpliquerait en grande partie par la structure corporelle des vers (constitu√©e de tissus mous) et leur mode de vie endoparasite.
Pour aller plus loin, d√©couvrez 10 des parasites humains les plus redoutables jamais d√©crits.
Par Yann Contegat, le
Source: IFL Science
√âtiquettes: parasite, https://dailygeekshow.com/tag/ver/, https://dailygeekshow.com/tag/tenia/
Cat√©gories: Sciences, Actualit√©s

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Skeletal remains found near Creve Coeur Lake identified as woman missing for months
text:
By Joey Schneider ,
2 hours ago
MARYLAND HEIGHTS, Mo. ‚Äì Authorities have tentatively identified human remains located near Creve Coeur Lake earlier this week as a woman reported missing for several months.
The Maryland Heights Police Department reports that the remains have tentatively been identified as Tammy Ann Pirrin, a 53-year-old woman from St. Louis City.
A billboard from the Missouri State Highway Patrol says the last point of contact with Pirrin was Sept. 6, 2024.
Authorities learned of the skeletal remains Tuesday afternoon in an area between Mallard and Creve Coeur lakes.
Maryland Heights police say the identification of Pirrin is considered ‚Äútentative‚Äù until the St. Louis County Medical Examiner‚Äôs Office has confirmed her identity.
Anyone with further information about Pirrin‚Äôs whereabouts over the past four months or anyone with information regarding her disappearance is asked to contact the Maryland Heights Police Department‚Äôs Bureau of Investigations at 314-298-7847.

1

author: Guardian staff reporter
title: South Australian shark attack: tributes flow for ‚Äòtalented and dearly loved‚Äô teenage surfer | South Australia | The Guardian
text:
A teenage boy killed in a shark attack off the coast of South Australia has been remembered as a talented and dearly loved member of the surfing community.
The 15-year-old, identified by friends and a family member as Khai Cowley, was mauled by a suspected great white while surfing off the remote Ethel beach on the Yorke Peninsula west of Adelaide about 1.30pm on Thursday.
Emergency services rushed to the popular surfing spot in Innes national park but were unable to save the boy, who was from Maslin Beach in Adelaide‚Äôs south, police said.
Surfing SA paid tribute to the talented surfer on Thursday night. ‚ÄúWe are devastated to learn that a young, talented and dearly loved member of our surfing community was the surfer involved in the attack at Ethel Beach, and are absolutely shattered to hear that the incident was fatal,‚Äù it said. ‚ÄúOur utmost deepest sympathies are with his family.‚Äù
South Australia imposes snap ban on school beach trips after multiple shark attacks
Read more The surf club MicroGroms Junior Boardriders said the teenager would be missed and sent ‚Äúlove and support to his family‚Äù. ‚ÄúIt is with immense sadness that Microgroms Junior Surf Club remember Khai after his devastating passing,‚Äù it said on social media.
‚ÄúKhai was a member since 2016 and will be remembered as a good friend and talented surfer who was well respected and admired by all that knew him.‚Äù
An undated image of Khai Cowley surfing. Photograph: SUPPLIED/AAP Ryan Valente, a local skipper with Reef Encounters who knows the Marion Bay region well, said it was unusual to see great whites in the area and he could not recall any similar encounters.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs stuff nightmares are made of,‚Äù he told ABC Radio on Friday. ‚ÄúYesterday itself, conditions-wise, was a very grim day: lightning, strong winds and it was quite a dark day. The town‚Äôs in a bit of shock, I guess. Our hearts go out to the family.‚Äù
Andrew Fox, a researcher at the Rodney Fox Shark Museum, said great whites were ambush predators and murky conditions on Thursday may have increased their activity.
‚ÄúThey‚Äôre more motivated ‚Äì bigger swell, dirty water,‚Äù he told ABC Radio. ‚ÄúAnything that increases the chances of an ambush predator.‚Äù
The death rounds out a horror year for beachgoers in the state, with three people killed by sharks and two othes injured.
In May a teacher, Simon Baccanello, 46, died in a suspected shark attack while surfing at Walkers Rock beach, about 365km west of Adelaide, before 55-year-old Tod Gendle was killed while surfing at Granites beach on the state‚Äôs west coast in October. Neither of their bodies were recovered.
Prof Charlie Huveneers, a shark expert at Flinders University, said the number of bites had risen globally over the past four decades, but they still occurred infrequently.
Human population growth, habitat destruction, declining water quality, climate change and the changing distribution of sharks and their prey were all likely contributors.
Huveneers said there were three main ways to mitigate shark attacks and serious injuries, including reducing the overlap of sharks and humans by establishing swimming enclosures or aerial surveillance, the use of personal electrical deterrents, and the use of bite-resistant wetsuits.
The South Australian premier, Peter Malinauskas, said his thoughts were with Khai‚Äôs family.
‚ÄúI can‚Äôt think of anything more horrific, particularly at this time of year,‚Äù he told Channel 9.
Malinauskas said the government was looking at a range of deterrents but the remoteness of South Australian beaches made it a difficult task.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got a coastline in South Australia that‚Äôs basically the equivalent of NSW and Victoria combined,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs impossible to net the entire area.
‚ÄúBut we‚Äôve seen 11 fatal shark attacks in South Australia since the year 2000, so the fact we‚Äôve seen three across this summer is startling and it is of concern.‚Äù
Explore more on these topics Sharks South Australia Animals Marine life Surfing news
Reuse this content

author: lsandoval
title: Presidente Boric firm√≥ decreto para revocar pensi√≥n de gracia otorgada a persona con antecedentes de pornograf√≠a infantil
text:
Comparte en X
La ministra del Interior,
Carolina Toh√°, confirm√≥ que el presidente Gabriel Boric ya firm√≥ el primer decreto de revocaci√≥n de pensi√≥n de gracia. Esto a una persona condenada por el delito de reproducci√≥n de material de pornograf√≠a infantil.
Desde La Araucan√≠a, la secretaria de Estado sostuvo que ‚Äúel Presidente de la Rep√∫blica, apenas conoci√≥ el tipo de delito en los cuales ten√≠an participaci√≥n algunos de los beneficiarios, tom√≥ una serie de definiciones en la semana pasada‚Äù.
‚ÄúDej√≥ firmada la pensi√≥n de gracia de una persona con antecedentes de pornograf√≠a infantil, que inmediatamente ese caso se deb√≠a revocar y no era uno de los casos con este da√±o permanente y grave como es la p√©rdida del globo ocular‚Äù, a√±adi√≥.
En esa l√≠nea, se√±al√≥ que en la mayor√≠a de los casos que se han conocido de personas con antecedentes penales graves ‚Äúno corresponden a las personas que tienen los da√±os m√°s severos, por ejemplo, la perdida del globo ocular. La enorme mayor√≠a son otro tipo de da√±os‚Äù.

author: Mohamed Jaouad EL KANABI
title: La coop√©ration entre le Maroc et l'Espagne r√©duit la migration irr√©guli√®re
text: La coop√©ration entre le Maroc et l‚ÄôEspagne, port√©e par une s√©rie de r√©formes diplomatiques et s√©curitaires, s‚Äôillustre par une avanc√©e majeure dans la lutte contre l‚Äôimmigration irr√©guli√®re. Dans une r√©cente d√©claration, le ministre espagnol de l‚ÄôInt√©rieur, Fernando Grande-Marlaska, a soulign√© l‚Äôefficacit√© de la coop√©ration entre l‚ÄôEspagne et les pays africains, y compris le Maroc. Fernando Grande-Marlaska, a r√©cemment mis en lumi√®re cette collaboration fructueuse qui, en 2023, a permis de contrecarrer plus de 27 000 tentatives de migration vers l‚ÄôEspagne. Cette action pr√©ventive repr√©sente environ 40 % des d√©parts irr√©guliers, t√©moignant de l‚Äôengagement conjoint dans la protection des fronti√®res et des droits humains. Dans cette lutte contre l‚Äôimmigration irr√©guli√®re, le partenariat strat√©gique entre le Maroc et l‚ÄôEspagne se distingue comme un mod√®le de coop√©ration internationale. Fortifi√©e par la reprise des relations diplomatiques, cette alliance a permis d‚Äôatteindre des r√©sultats notables : une r√©duction significative de pr√®s de 50% des flux migratoires irr√©guliers vers l‚ÄôEspagne d√®s le premier trimestre de 2023, en comparaison avec la m√™me p√©riode de l‚Äôann√©e pr√©c√©dente. Ces interventions sont consid√©r√©es comme des mesures vitales non seulement pour la s√©curit√© frontali√®re, mais aussi pour la pr√©servation des vies humaines en pr√©venant les travers√©es maritimes p√©rilleuses. En parall√®le, l‚ÄôEspagne continue de faire face √† l‚Äôarriv√©e de migrants sur ses c√¥tes, notamment sur les √Æles Canaries, o√π un nombre record d‚Äôarriv√©es a √©t√© enregistr√© fin 2023. Les premiers jours de janvier ont vu l‚Äôarriv√©e de 381 migrants, sauv√©s en mer et amen√©s sur l‚Äôarchipel, avec des interventions de sauvetage n√©cessitant des soins m√©dicaux pour certains. En 2023, il y a eu une r√©duction de 51 % des arriv√©es maritimes au premier trimestre par rapport √† la m√™me p√©riode de l‚Äôann√©e pr√©c√©dente. Cette r√©duction a continu√© la tendance √† la baisse observ√©e les ann√©es pr√©c√©dentes, avec une chute de 25,6 % des entr√©es ill√©gales en Espagne de 2021 √† 2022. L‚Äôefficacit√© de la coop√©ration maroco-espagnole a √©t√© un facteur d√©terminant dans l‚Äôapproche de la question des arriv√©es irr√©guli√®res. Cette collaboration entre les deux Royaumes se traduit par une diminution notable des arriv√©es, avec 56 852 personnes ayant atteint l‚ÄôEspagne l‚Äôann√©e derni√®re, une augmentation certes, mais qui aurait pu √™tre plus importante sans ces mesures. Le partenariat avec le Maroc, en particulier, s‚Äôav√®re √™tre un pilier dans cette r√©ussite, avec des op√©rations cibl√©es contre les r√©seaux criminels impliqu√©s dans le trafic de migrants. Le Maroc, en sa qualit√© de pays de transit, d√©ploie des efforts consid√©rables pour endiguer ce ph√©nom√®ne qui touche l‚ÄôEspagne et, au-del√†, l‚ÄôEurope enti√®re. Ces efforts s‚Äôinscrivent dans un contexte dans lequel le Royaume s‚Äôaffirme non seulement comme un gardien des portes de l‚ÄôEurope, mais aussi comme un acteur proactif dans la s√©curisation des routes migratoires. Cette dynamique b√©n√©ficie du soutien financier de l‚ÄôEspagne et de l‚ÄôUnion europ√©enne, cette derni√®re ayant promis au Maroc une aide substantielle pour couvrir les d√©penses op√©rationnelles li√©es √† la surveillance et au contr√¥le des flux migratoires. Ces efforts conjoints entre le Maroc et l‚ÄôEspagne ont permis de sauver des vies et de minimiser les voyages p√©rilleux vers l‚ÄôEurope. Aujourd‚Äôhui, les relations maroco-espagnoles, √† l‚Äôapog√©e de leur collaboration, d√©montrent la volont√© mutuelle d‚Äôenrichir et de p√©renniser leur partenariat. Le Maroc participe activement √† des initiatives de s√©curit√© r√©gionale, notamment l‚Äôop√©ration ¬´ Active Endeavour ¬ª de l‚ÄôOTAN et l‚Äôexercice maritime ¬´ Seaboard ¬ª dans le cadre de l‚Äôinitiative 5+5 en M√©diterran√©e occidentale. Les r√©sultats de cette coop√©ration se mesurent non seulement en termes de chiffres, mais aussi en vies humaines √©pargn√©es, √©vitant ainsi les p√©rils d‚Äôun voyage souvent dangereux vers l‚ÄôEurope. L‚Äôapproche adopt√©e entre les deux pays va au-del√† de la simple r√©pression, mettant l‚Äôaccent sur la pr√©vention et le d√©mant√®lement des r√©seaux de traite, avec un impact direct sur la baisse des chiffres de l‚Äôimmigration irr√©guli√®re. Les relations maroco-espagnoles, aujourd‚Äôhui au sommet de leur collaboration, t√©moignent de la volont√© partag√©e d‚Äôenrichir continuellement leur partenariat. Le Maroc, par le biais de ses Forces Arm√©es Royales (FAR), participe activement √† des initiatives de s√©curit√© r√©gionale, telles que l‚Äôop√©ration ¬´ Active Endeavour ¬ª de l‚ÄôOTAN, et l‚Äôexercice maritime ¬´ Seaboard ¬ª dans le cadre de l‚Äôinitiative 5+5 en M√©diterran√©e occidentale. La r√©duction des arriv√©es irr√©guli√®res est une illustration tangible de l‚Äôefficacit√© de cette coop√©ration. Toutefois, le d√©fi reste entier, avec une vigilance constante requise pour maintenir ces r√©sultats et poursuivre les efforts dans un contexte migratoire mondial en constante √©volution. Cette collaboration est destin√©e √† se renforcer davantage, avec la finalisation prochaine d‚Äôaccords couvrant la s√©curit√©, l‚Äô√©conomie, l‚Äôindustrie et la lutte continue contre l‚Äôimmigration irr√©guli√®re, signifiant un engagement continu des deux nations pour relever ces d√©fis ensemble. Le Maroc et l‚ÄôEspagne s‚Äôengagent ainsi √† perp√©tuer et √† enrichir leurs relations d‚Äôexcellence, en restant des partenaires incontournables dans la s√©curisation de la r√©gion m√©diterran√©enne et dans la promotion d‚Äôune gestion migratoire responsable et durable. Du tout bon dans ce cadre, des prochaines R√©unions de Haut Niveau (RHN) pour finaliser de nouveaux accords bilat√©raux et consolider les acquis de ces derni√®res ann√©es.

author: Jos√© Alejandro Mendoza
title: El autor de One Piece y el de Bleach dibujan a los protagonistas de la otra serie y es genial
text: El autor de One Piece y el de Bleach dibujan a los protagonistas de la otra serie y es genial Eiichiro Oda y Tite Kubo se rinden homenaje con estas asombrosas ilustraciones de Luffy e Ichigo. [Jos√© Alejandro Mendoza](https://www.mundodeportivo.com/alfabeta/author/jose-alejandro-mendoza)en [Series](https://www.mundodeportivo.com/alfabeta/series) Para nadie es un secreto que tanto One Piece como Bleach son dos de las obras m√°s aclamadas y exitosas de todos los tiempos, ya que ambas historias formaron parte del ‚ÄúGran Trio del Shonen‚Äù junto a Naruto, convirti√©ndose en las series que lograron marcar un antes y un despu√©s en la industria manga/anime, causando un gran impacto que, a d√≠a de hoy, sigue muy vigente. Asimismo, Eiichiro Oda y Tite Kubo han deslumbrado a los fans con sus fascinantes historias y su gran talento para relatar estas distintivas tramas que han logrado trascender a trav√©s del tiempo, pues tanto One Piece como Bleach siguen siendo obras muy destacadas a tal punto que ambas han causado mucha nostalgia a los fans al estar en emisi√≥n al mismo tiempo, haci√©ndolos rememorar los viejos tiempos. Pero esto no es todo, ya que, como muestra de respeto, Tite Kubo realiz√≥ una ilustraci√≥n de Monkey D. Luffy muy genial y tiempo despu√©s, Eiichiro Oda le devolvi√≥ el cumplido al dibujar a Ichigo Kurosaki para celebrar el regreso del anime de Bleach: TYBW, teniendo resultados sumamente incre√≠bles. Monkey D. Luffy e Ichigo Kurosaki cobran vida a trav√©s de estas grandiosas ilustraciones [One Piece tras m√°s de 1.000 cap√≠tulos en su haber](https://www.mundodeportivo.com/alfabeta/one-piece/temporadas-one-piece-capitulos) se ha consagrado como una de las obras m√°s respetadas e influyentes de todos los tiempos, pues las trepidantes aventuras de Luffy han logrado cautivar a millones de fans a nivel mundial, y el 2023 ha sido un claro ejemplo de ello, ya que este ha sido uno de los a√±os m√°s exitosos de la franquicia de Oda. Por otro lado, Bleach tambi√©n se ha ganado su lugar en el podio durante d√©cadas, ya que la grandiosa obra de Tite Kubo ha tenido un √©xito sin precedentes con la nueva temporada de [Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War, la cual adaptar√° en 2024 la parte 3 de este controvertido arco](https://www.mundodeportivo.com/alfabeta/series/bleach-thousand-year-blood-war-revela-un-nuevo-trailer-de-su-parte-3) que ha dejado batallas y momentos memorables que han engrandecido la historia de Ichigo Kurosaki. Debido al gran √©xito que han tenido ambas franquicias este a√±o, el usuario llamado [@sandman_AP](https://twitter.com/sandman_AP) a trav√©s de X, ha hecho resurgir dos geniales ilustraciones realizadas por ambos mangakas en el pasado, en las cuales se puede apreciar que Tite Kubo dibuj√≥ a Luffy y Eiichiro Oda ilustr√≥ a Ichigo Kurosaki, demostrando el respeto que existe entre estos artistas. Oda drew Ichigo (Bleach) in 2021, and Kubo drew Luffy in 2007. I hope Oda and Kubo will have an interview some day.üòç‚Äî sandman (@sandman_AP) [pic.twitter.com/EPKHsFKiXG] [December 27, 2023] En la primera imagen se puede apreciar la ilustraci√≥n que realiz√≥ Eiichiro Oda de Ichigo en el a√±o 2021 para conmemorar el regreso del anime Bleach:TYBW y en la otra se muestra el dibujo que realiz√≥ Tite Kubo de Luffy en el a√±o 2007, siendo estos bocetos grandes homenajes que han incluido el toque distintivo de cada mangaka, haciendo de estas ilustraciones m√°s ic√≥nicas e importantes. Evidentemente, en el dibujo que Oda realiz√≥ de Ichigo se pueden apreciar los rasgos y dise√±os que el mangaka suele utilizar para crear a sus personajes, y en la ilustraci√≥n de Kubo tambi√©n se ha podido admirar el reconocido estilo de dibujo de este artista, puesto que la cara de Luffy tiene mucha semejanza a algunos de los personajes que se pueden ver en Bleach. Cabe destacar que este ha sido un detalle sumamente interesante que engrandece la historia y el legado de One Piece y Bleach, pues ambos mangakas se han dado muestras de respeto a trav√©s de estos geniales homenajes que capturan la esencia de estos artistas de manera sublime. Es necesario resaltar que muchos fans de ambas IP han realizado algunos [crossovers de Bleach y One Piece](https://www.mundodeportivo.com/alfabeta/one-piece/one-piece-y-bleach-se-unen-en-uno-de-los-mejores-crossover-que-veras-nunca) de manera √©pica, pues le han dado rienda suelta a su imaginaci√≥n para unir a los personajes en una sola misma historia, teniendo resultados muy asombrosos.

author: Daniel Fortin NonStop Local Digital Journalist
title: Hit-and-run suspect arrested by Spokane Valley deputies | Spokane News | khq.com
text:
SPOKANE VALLEY, Wash. - Spokane Valley deputies arrested a woman after she crashed into a parked car and drove away. She was also arrested for several unrelated felonies.
On Sunday, April 21 , around 9:40 a.m., Spokane Valley deputies responded to a report of a car crashing into a parked car in the 11700 block of East Railroad Avenue.
The victim, who was not in the car during the crash, said the suspect driver got out of the car and walked away without ever trying to contact the victim.
Deputies said the victim described the suspect, and video from a nearby home showed the suspect, later identified as 42-year-old Stefanie J. J. Floch.
Deputies said Floch had several unrelated felony and misdemeanor warrants for her arrest for charges of two counts of Possession of Stolen Property 2nd Degree, two counts of Identity Theft 2nd Degree, Hit and Run, and two counts of First Degree Driving While Suspended/Revoked.
During their investigation, Spokane Valley deputies located Floch in her house in the 11900 block of East Railroad Avenue.
Floch was transported and booked into the Spokane County Jail on new charges of Hit-and-Run (Unattended Vehicle) and First Degree Driving While Suspended/Revoked.
Due to her other felonies, Spokane County Superior Court set her bond at $28,500.
